column4: i have no experience on Linux. I am trying to install Xubuntu 6.06 on a Intel Celeron 466Mhz, 128MB RAM with 800X600 monitor
i changed the resolution on 800X600 but can't see full screen, anyone can help ?
get the Xubuntu alternate CD, and install it that way.  Probably you're best bet.
I downloaded Xubuntu image and running it from there, it is also freeze on some points...now it is froze at step 5/6 (partition)
